pr_title: Test for removed dynamic filters explicitly

timeline.bodyText:
i prefer the previous formatting
i know it does not conform to our global formatting rules, but i find this way more readable in plan tests
timeline.author: findepi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -116,7 +116,8 @@ public void testUnconsumedDynamicFilterInJoin()
                 join(
                         INNER,
                         ImmutableList.of(equiJoinClause("ORDERS_OK", "LINEITEM_OK")),
-                        filter("ORDERS_OK > 0",

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/presto-main/src/test/java/io/prestosql/sql/planner/optimizations/TestRemoveUnsupportedDynamicFilters.java b/presto-main/src/test/java/io/prestosql/sql/planner/optimizations/TestRemoveUnsupportedDynamicFilters.java
index ae4d4a91e1..51d4e3409b 100644
--- a/presto-main/src/test/java/io/prestosql/sql/planner/optimizations/TestRemoveUnsupportedDynamicFilters.java
+++ b/presto-main/src/test/java/io/prestosql/sql/planner/optimizations/TestRemoveUnsupportedDynamicFilters.java

@@ -116,8 +115,9 @@ public class TestRemoveUnsupportedDynamicFilters
                 join(
                         INNER,
                         ImmutableList.of(equiJoinClause("ORDERS_OK", "LINEITEM_OK")),
-                        filter(
-                                "ORDERS_OK > 0",
+                        PlanMatchPattern.filter(
+                                expression("ORDERS_OK > 0"),
+                                TRUE_LITERAL,
                                 tableScan("orders", ImmutableMap.of("ORDERS_OK", "orderkey"))),
                         tableScan("lineitem", ImmutableMap.of("LINEITEM_OK", "orderkey"))));
     }

timeline.message: Test for removed dynamic filters explicitly
